recipes.label: The Consequences of Fame
recipes.startdescription: My follower benefits from their popularity, and suffers from it, too. The flash of eager cameras, the barking of unscrupulous reporters - an ill-informed word might spell disaster for our reputation.
recipes.description: The crowd has had its fun. We take the first chance to escape the throng of sycophants and instigators, slipping away with our dignity mostly intact.

recipes.label: A Scandalous Gaffe!
recipes.startdescription: We have uttered something the papers will run with for days on end -

recipes.label: A Intriguing Statement
recipes.startdescription: Our words are not directly scandalous, but they are enough to keep the public interested a little longer -

recipes.label: An Opportunity for Profit
recipes.startdescription: My follower has found an opportunity to benefit a little more from this endeavour -

recipes.label: Veiled Movements
recipes.startdescription: My follower has capitalized on preparations they've made to conceal their deeds -

recipes.label: A Series of Pleasantries
recipes.startdescription: My follower is possessed of an infectious sense of optimism -

recipes.label: Minutes and Memory
recipes.startdescription: My follower reminds me of certain moments, and certain forgotten things -

recipes.label: Diseased Knowledge
recipes.startdescription: My follower does not always understand the things they say. I hope they do not.

recipes.label: Ghastly Exchanges
recipes.startdescription: My follower does not mean to unnerve me when they speak. I am half-certain they do not.

recipes.label: Edification in All Things
recipes.startdescription: My follower's presence is conducive to learning -

recipes.label: Unlikely Inspiration
recipes.startdescription: Here and there, my follower's knotted wit bears something striking -
